1   package org.greatage.ioc.cache;
2   
3   /**
4    * @author Ivan Khalopik
5    * @since 1.0
6    */
7   public class JCache<K, V> implements Cache<K, V> {
8   	private final net.sf.jsr107cache.Cache cache;
9   	private final String name;
10  
11  	public JCache(final net.sf.jsr107cache.Cache cache, final String name) {
12  		this.cache = cache;
13  		this.name = name;
14  	}
15  
16  	public String getName() {
17  		return name;
18  	}
19  
20  	public boolean contains(final K key) {
21  		return cache.containsKey(key);
22  	}
23  
24  	@SuppressWarnings({"unchecked"})
25  	public V get(final K key) {
26  		return (V) cache.get(key);
27  	}
28  
29  	public void put(final K key, final V value) {
30  		cache.put(key, value);
31  	}
32  
33  	@SuppressWarnings({"unchecked"})
34  	public V remove(final K key) {
35  		return (V) cache.remove(key);
36  	}
37  
38  	public void clear() {
39  		cache.clear();
40  	}
41  }
